thread.title: WATCH: New ‘Wonder Woman’ trailer shows Diana’s evolution
thread.title_full: WATCH: New ‘Wonder Woman’ trailer shows Diana’s evolution

author: Rappler.com
title: WATCH: New ‘Wonder Woman’ trailer shows Diana’s evolution
text: WATCH: New ‘Wonder Woman’ trailer shows Diana’s evolution Diana learns how fight harder and better in the new 'Wonder Woman' trailer Published 4:02 PM, March 12, 2017 Updated 4:02 PM, March 12, 2017 TRAINING. Diana is surprised by her powers while in training. Screengrab from YouTube/Warner Bros. Pictures MANILA, Philippines – A new trailer for Wonder Woman was released on Saturday, March 11, giving us a glimpse of Diana’s origins and her evolution into the superhero we know today. ( WATCH: A new 'Wonder Woman' trailer is here! ) In the new clip, we see Diana as a little girl, and later as a young woman training hard to become stronger. But during one practice when her Antiope tells her not to let her guard down and tries to hit her with a sword, Diana manages to deflect the blade. "You will train her harder than any Amazon before her. Five times harder, 10 times harder, even until she's better than you. But she must never know the truth about what she is," we hear in the voiceover. The next scenes show Diana meeting Steve Trevor and leaving Themyscira to help end a war. Aside from the trailer, a new poster for the movie was also released over the weekend. A post shared by Gal Gadot (@gal_gadot) on Mar 10, 2017 at 10:02am PST Wonder Woman stars Gal Gadot, Chris Pine, Robin Wright and Connie Nielsen. The movie is directed by Patty Jenkins and will open in the US this June. – Rappler.com HOW DOES THIS STORY MAKE YOU FEEL? Happy
